{"step_by_step_thinking": "Applying pressure on the angle of the jaw while maintaining a patent airway can potentially damage the nerves in that area. The nerves in the angle of the jaw include the inferior alveolar nerve (a branch of the trigeminal nerve), which supplies sensation to the lower teeth, lip, and chin.
